short_summary: Procurement of office seating (rotary chairs) Canadian Heritage Department
description: Award of Contract to lowest bidder
full_summary:
### Rotary Chair Tender Notice
ID: cb-555-2875649; Solicitation: 10232387-A; Amendment: 5
**Issued Date:** January 24, 2024; **Closing Date:** February 5, 2024, 2:00 PM (EST)

**Description**

Canadian Heritage announces a tender notice seeking a supplier for the supply, delivery, and installation of rotary chairs for office seating at 200 rue Sacré-Coeur, Gatineau, QC, J8X 4C6, by March 31, 2024. Suppliers will be required to provide products from the following UNSPSC categories: *56101504"*56101700".

This tender (RFB) is issued pursuant to the PWGSC Supply Arrangement (SA) #E60PQ-120001/H. The tender notice cancels and supersedes previous tender number 10232387 dated December 7, 2023.

**Purchase Requirements**

- Product sub-category 1: Rotary chairs;
- Delivery and installation of office seating at the specified location;
- Annual Maintenance guarantee: Not Applicable.

**Notice Instructions**
This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). Suppliers who are pre-qualified and have obtained a Supply Arrangement (SA) are eligible to bid. Non-SA holders may submit a bid but are required to submit a separate request to the Supply Arrangement Authority (SAA) for evaluation.

Contract Awarding: Canada reserves the right to consider only proposals submitted by eligible suppliers. The selection of a successful supplier is subject to standard regulations and the successful bidder may be required to provide proof of qualification as a supplier.

**Evaluation of Proposals**

The evaluation of proposals will be on a 'best value' basis, where the lowest price will be the basis of selection. Price will be the determining factor.

**Procurement Documents**

To access a copy of the solicitation document, please visit [Canada Buy and Sell Website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca).


**Contractor Information**

Name: Martin Lafleur
Title: Acting Procurement Advisor
Department: Canadian Heritage
Department contact: 15 Eddy St., 9th floor, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0M5; ([contrats-contracting@pch.gc.ca](mailto:contrats-contracting@pch.gc.ca))

Phone: 000 000-0000; E-mail: contrats-contracting
